reviews.text: Nice quiet place for great stationary shopping. Huge variety too! Even have a very good section of smart devices! Huge variety of books too! Many nice paper bags to get! Staffs are really friendly, helpful and efficient! Have a very easy to use self paying kiosk!

This Popular store at Tampines Mall is quite popular. Gets quite crowded towards lunch time. You can find assessment and text books, novels, computer hardware and accessories, printers and other gadgets as well as stationery. The store is well organised
The staff are helpful and service oriented over here.
Bought a fan here just now. About a few months ago, I purchased a power bank here. The store is big. The staff are helpful and friendly. But they need to learn to smile more. Recommended!

Will often buy my stationaries over here for daily use. Different type of pens can be purchased over here and some with refill ink. Colour papers for school projects. There are electronic accessory but rather buy at challenger.

Complaint Regarding Unprofessional Service & Denied Exchange Request - Marvin

Dear Popular Tampines

I’m writing to express my frustration with a recent interaction I had with one of your staff members, Marvin. On Monday, 09 December, 17:59 SGT, I attempted to exchange an item, but Marvin refused to process the exchange because the item had been opened. While I understand the importance of return policies, I was unaware that the item contained a wired component when I opened it. Marvin insisted that the situation "cannot be misinterpreted" because the picture on the packaging clearly showed it, which I find unhelpful. As a customer, I did not fully recognize the item’s specific details, and I would have appreciated more assistance or understanding from him.
What made the situation even more disappointing was Marvin's rude and dismissive attitude. I expected a more respectful and professional approach when trying to resolve an issue, especially since this was a genuine misunderstanding on my part.

I would appreciate it if you could review this situation and consider a resolution, whether through a policy exception or another alternative. Clearer guidance on product details and return policies would help prevent confusion in the future. Thank you for your time and attention. I look forward to your response.
